laboratory_examinations.findings: Normoglycemia observed with a glucose level of 20 mg/dL after birth and stabilization of glucose levels over the monitoring period.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient 1 showed a transient growth deceleration during the first 2 years of somatuline treatment, with catch-up growth thereafter.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Inappropriately elevated insulin (up to 37.5 pmol/liter) and C-peptide (up to 0.58 ng/ml) during three different episodes of hypoglycemia were detected.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: No specific changes over time were noted.
Gallbladder US findings are stable with some improvement noted on subsequent ultrasound studies.
